description:
SeismiX shows the current earthquake activity from around the world. 

For people with interest in worldwide or regional earthquake activity or having friends, family or colleagues in quake intense regions, this app gives the ability to closely  monitor earthquake activity.

All recent earthquakes worldwide are displayed in a list with color-coded magnitude, region, date&time, depth as well as how far from your current (or any entered) location.
Each temblor can be visualized on a fully interactive Google map along with its details.

Features included:
- List of quakes regularly refreshed after configurable time (10-120 min.) or on demand
- List can be filtered to show last 24 hours or last 7 days
- Earthquake epicenter mapped on an interactive Google map
- Set up your own filter/option for 
+ minimum magnitude 
+ maximum distance to epicenter (shows only earthquakes in my area)
+ refresh time
+ distance to epicenter displayed in kilometers, miles or nautical miles
+ Select US Gelogical Survey (USGS) and/or European Mediterranean Seismological Centre (EMSC) as data source

New in this version:
Better overview through color-coded magnitude respresenting the strength and impact of the earthquake. Tested on webOS 2.2.0 and TouchPad.

A working internet connection is required.
Available in English, German.
For more details check www.appswerkz.com
